title: [Imaera's Temple, Sanctuary]
description: Elongated modwir panels are secured into a spacious semi-circular room that fans around one half of the outside tree.  Three glass-paned windows look out over the grove, illuminating the walls with tessellated bronze and copper light.  Raw silk cushions sit before an ornate faewood carving fitted against the entirety of the back wall, conforming seamlessly to the living tree trunk behind it.

Elongated modwir panels are secured into a spacious semi-circular room that fans around one half of the outside tree.  Three glass-paned windows look out over the grove, illuminating the walls with a pale lunar glow.  Raw silk cushions sit before an ornate faewood carving fitted against the entirety of the back wall, conforming seamlessly to the living tree trunk behind it.
